user_input:
Please create hourly hydrogen demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios. Use the 'NT', 'NT_HE' and 'NT_LE' Scenarios.
Use the year 2030, 2035, 2040 and 2050. Split the nodes. Convert to tst format.
No need to access any PLEXOS database for now
author: Assistant
default_llm_context: Perform the specified operation based on the user's input and the Terajoule Model specifications. No PLEXOS database access is required; use functions to generate data files and export to TST format.

function_args.user_input: Generate hourly hydrogen demand profiles for TYNDP 2026 using scenarios ['NT','NT_HE','NT_LE'] and years [2030,2035,2040,2050]. Enable node splitting. Do not access any PLEXOS database. Produce outputs suitable for subsequent TST export.

tasks.description: Generate hourly hydrogen demand profiles for TYNDP 2026 using scenarios ['NT', 'NT_HE', 'NT_LE'] and years [2030, 2035, 2040, 2050], with node splitting enabled.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', select the most appropriate {entity_type} from the following list.

tasks.description: Export the generated hourly hydrogen demand profiles to TST format for the TYNDP study team with carrier='hydrogen'.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', select the most appropriate {entity_type} from the following list.
